l01_desc: Learn how to programmatically explore the library structure via stateless Brain discovery.
l02_desc: Solve limits using strict academic rigor. Application of the Golden Standard argument mapping.
l03_desc: Parallelized execution. The system queries multiple authors (Fikhtengolts, Kudryavtsev) simultaneously.
l04_desc: Constructing 3D plane equations and measuring shortest distance from a point to a surface.
l05_desc: Computing the Rotor (Curl) of a vector field using SymPy's high-precision symbolic logic.
l06_desc: Solving partial differential equations and modeling physical wave propagation.
cmt_l02: Solve limit using Zorich's mathematical rigor
cmt_l03: Parallel execution of multiple Fourier experts
cmt_l05: Calculate the Rotor (Curl) of a vector field
